video_prompt: **Prompt:** An anime-style female character's full body slowly turns, extending her hand. Her long pink hair sways as subtle blue light streaks flash and crackle across the background behind her, creating depth and dynamic movement.
image_prompt: Anime art of a female character with long pink hair, fair skin, blue eyes, and light pink lips. On the left, a close-up of her face with diamond earrings and a circular pendant necklace. On the right, a full-body view in a white "KANVACA / YASOYONO" t-shirt, black shorts with light blue accents, and athletic shoes, with her right arm extended forward. Vibrant blue background with bright blue jagged lines resembling lightning or ice cracks. Dynamic, modern anime style.
refined_video_prompt: An anime-style character slowly rotates, her hand extending. Her long pink hair sways fluidly. Behind her, dynamic blue light streaks continually flash and crackle, rapidly altering the background.
